snippet.title: Valhalla: Zero Player Automatic RPG
snippet.description:
ZPG (Zero Player Game) RPG. Valhalla is a zero-player role-playing game in which the player has no direct control of the character, and only chooses a name and a class. The character just wandering around, fighting random enemies, trading NPCs and collecting items. Upon levelling, the character recieves some random new equipment and a few stat bonuses.

Features
Absolutely no effort needed to play, just run the game and watch the progress (yeah, that's lazy)
Unlimited level cap
✅ More #OpenSourceGames http://bit.ly/OSGames 🔴 Subscribe now!
💎 Join our chat at https://discord.gg/usAHQdz !
💬 Write a comment about your favorite moment!

Free from https://sourceforge.net/projects/zpg/
